title: Ep. 1: The Rise of Deepfakes
summary: We dive into the technology behind deepfakes, their potential for misuse in spreading misinformation, and what can be done to detect them.

title: Ep. 2: Is Your Smart Home Spying on You?
summary: A look at the privacy implications of smart home devices. We discuss data collection, security vulnerabilities, and how to protect your personal information.

title: Ep. 3: Password Psychology
summary: Why do we use weak passwords? This episode explores the psychology behind password creation and offers practical tips for creating strong, memorable credentials.
